channel.title: The X-Factor
channel.description: Just been listening to an excellent programme from BBC Radio 4 - The X Factor. Not a story of wanabe pop stars, but a tale of what it is like to go into space and how the experience is about...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by davidg+00:00
item.description:
Excuse the plug but... if you have a Mac you should be able to convert the program to MP3 with an app I wrote called StreamRecorder. I wanted to listen to BBC stuff on my iPod, but the Real streams prevented me. You can find it here:
http://homepage.mac.com/david_griffiths/StreamRecorder.html
item.dc:creator: davidg
